website_summaries.verdict: Hang your coats, stow your shoes and other items, and grab a seat while you get ready to walk out the door – this hall tree has it all.
pros: This sturdy, handsome hall tree stands out for its antique wood finish that gives it a classy look
Has a three-tier design with a middle shelf that doubles as a bench, and five nicely spaced coat hooks
cons: Rare packages arrive with an occasional bent hook
Pricier than some of its competitors, but also has a lot to offer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it!!! It was exactly what I was looking for, and so easy to put together. It took me about 30 minutes to put together, and it's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Sowder

customer_reviews.title: the frame is nice and seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: According to the seller this product was made with real wood. Turns out it is real wood particle board pressed together and covered with wood look laminate. That being said, the frame is nice and seems sturdy. We will be replacing to "wood" with real-real wood.
customer_reviews.author: Wards

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for 400 lbs people
customer_reviews.text: Such a quality piece, very sturdy. I'm 400 lbs man and it can handle me like champ. And very good cool
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hatchell

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Quality, look of it, assembly, all of it - amazing! We have received a compliment on this piece of furniture by every person that walks in the door and sees it for the 1st time. Really pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cranefamily208

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful piece and was fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Product arrive damaged. This is a beautiful piece and was fairly easy to assemble. I would love to change my review if they send me a new piece to fix the damaged one. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very functional, gorgeous piece - lower quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous piece that is really functional. I have it set up in my living room and it's serving a wonderful purpose in the entry area for our coats and briefcases, bookbags, purses, etc. I have hats on top and baskets on the bottom. Awesome little find. My only complaint comes around the workmanship. We had an issue with one of the screws and it popped through the top and left us with a scar on the edge of the top. I am not sure how to replace the seating board but if I could I would. That was frustrating and I was disappointed in the low quality. I would like to have real wood in that instance.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great look . Great value
customer_reviews.text: After looking at several hall trees , this one was the best for the money. It’s taller than most in this price range. Has a much more expensive look than it’s price tag would indicate. It would hv been nice to hv my husband help me ,but he didn’t . So with no help and with only picture directions i had no problem doing it alone. All instructions and pieces are laid out for ease of assembly. And as a self proclaimed Amazon VIP CUSTOMER I would highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: AmzPrimeVIP

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material & very poor customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: While I was putting it together I noticed I couldn’t put 2 screws in to hold the bench down because it was cut wrong. The holes didn’t like up. Then when I went to put one of the most important pieces on it was broke. I tried calling the manufacturer an was on hold for 30 min with no one answering my call only to have them hang up on me & I not able to call them back because they had closed! So I sent them an email. Only to be told that they didn’t have the replacement part to send me! So what’s the use of buying from a company that doesn’t have spare parts?!
customer_reviews.author: Heather MorleyPark

customer_reviews.title: I had a small entryway and was looking for a hall tree that wasn't very long or wide and this is perfect, several inches smaller than a lot of similar ...
customer_reviews.text: Product looks exactly as pictured. Modern, urban chic, and high quality appearance. I had a small entryway and was looking for a hall tree that wasn't very long or wide and this is perfect, several inches smaller than a lot of similar products. Wasn't as difficult to assemble as some reviewers suggested. I put it together on my own without any hassle. I had my eye on this product for months and it's considerably cheaper on Amazon when I purchased it than it was on several other websites.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing find!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to start by saying what a fabulous piece of furniture. I've been looking for something to put in our entryway for over a year. This was the perfect color size and price. The shipping was quick and very efficient. The directions were easy to follow took me about 30 minutes to put it together. The finished product was exactly what I was looking for, I've already received several compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but some quality issues
customer_reviews.text: This took me a solid three hours to assemble myself. Two of the drill holes into the bench part did not line up correctly. I disassembled it, tried to correct it to see if I had done something making it slightly off. There was no way they would line up. It wasn’t expensive so I am not terribly upset, and the other ones all fit so I feel like it is still secure, BUT it isn’t frustrating to spend hours only to realize it was a manufacturing error.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Really looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This took about 30 minutes to assemble and it fits perfectly where I planned. BUT! the picture shows it with 2 baskets, and there are none. Not sure if we just didn't get them, or they were only for the picture. Either way, I am disappointed not getting them. If the baskets truly don't come with the bench, they should not be in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Condon

customer_reviews.title: nice and sturdy unit... worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: really like the real wood and sturdiness. took exactly 45 minutes to put together loved that they labeled the pieces even the screws! only issue is I thought the actually piece that holds the coat hooks were too low, would have liked it a little higher to hang longer coats. but definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This piece took my twelve year old son and I about one hour and twenty minutes to put together. It was fairly easy to assemble and much better quality than I expected. It fit perfectly in the space it was purchased for and is perfect in every way except the screws almost came through the other side of the bench seat... otherwise it would have been five stars.
customer_reviews.author: a.garcia

customer_reviews.title: Can I get $8 back?
customer_reviews.text: Directions say wood glue is recommended for the dowels. There are no dowels, I’d love $8 back for the wood glue I went and bought. Other than the odd recommendation for wood glue, the directions were good and assembly was easy for one person in 20-30 minutes. Anchoring was important on our carpeted floor to keep it still.
customer_reviews.author: OBX

customer_reviews.title: Such a great piece!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hall tree for over a year now and it's still in perfect condition. The seat and shelf are particle board with a printed image but it looks very quality and not fake. Everything fit properly when delivered and no missing pieces. I'm careful not to overload the hooks as they aren't super strong, but that's more over caution on my part. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Marriner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a couple of months for the perfect hall tree and am SO glad I chose this one. The price was perfect and it was so easy to assemble. I had a party at my house not long after I bought this and got so many compliments on it. It's great for a family to hang lunch bags, coats, backpacks, purses....and to put shoes on when you come in the door. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kay O.

customer_reviews.title: Looks greats really sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome. Assembly def takes some time but it's sturdy & heavy duty. Only thing I'd change would be the straps to hold it against the wall there awkward & odd so I didn't even put them up. Also when holy open the box there's a huge sign that fell out saying it contains formeldahyde which isn't cool but then again we live in carginagens so what the hell. Over all I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deebee03

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent find
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, but some of the screws didn’t match up so they’re missing a few. You can tell it’s on the cheap side, but that’s expected these days. The shelf on the top is awesome though! More space to decorate :)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely in my hallway. Didn’t completely read the description and was Under the impression that the baskets were included (they are not). I only wish that the hooks were up a little higher, but this suits its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bench. Was easy enough to put together, only needed a hand with the top. I've not bolted my to the wall as I am not storing anything but hats and scarves up there and it feels extremely solid. I would absolutely recommend this purchase. Keeps all my children's things for school right by the door and organized for easier mornings!
customer_reviews.author: TruthfullySpeaking

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the Hall Tree!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy. Has some weight to it. Even comes with anchors that attach to the top portion that you can mount to your wall - as this is a slim structure and there's a chance it can tip over if you place heavy items on the top. (Other than that - I don't think you need to attach to the wall if not placing those heavy items on the top). Works well. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Khul

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this piece of furniture. Perfect size, very stable & secure at a great price. I didn't have to secure it to the wall. It went together in less than an hour and it looks great in the hallway. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a nice, small-space hall tree that will easily hold at least 5 coats and provides seating and extra storage space for gloves, scarves and hats.
customer_reviews.author: JANET C. DEVINE-SHERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hall Tree
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself and it took some time but it was easy. The parts are all numbered or lettered so makes it simple. It looks nice in my entry way. My only complaint with this is that the hooks are positioned quite low. I don't use it to sit on so it's not a problem for me, but could be inconvenient for others that do use it for that purpose,
customer_reviews.author: aprilwine

customer_reviews.title: Need an electric drill. So many scratches too.
customer_reviews.text: We like it but.... Instruction says we don't need an electric drill, however you definitely need an electronic drill otherwise It takes forever to build it and its gonna be a loose shelf...There were so many scratches too.
customer_reviews.author: mai koike

customer_reviews.title: Solid and spacious.
customer_reviews.text: Solid wood and metal. I ride motorcycle and bought this as a gear rack. My heavy jackets, boots, backpack, and helmets sit nicely along with my casual shoes and whatever else inevitably gets left on it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Smink

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE IT! I am not a person who can assemble things easily but this was super easy to put together and it looks absolutely classy yet practical as it serves its purpose. Delivery was fast and I received it before expected date, no damages and well packed. Love it and absolutely will recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Love my little hall tree. Looks great and is sturdy. I did have to contact customer support to get a replacement piece that was damaged, but that was easy to do. It is a bit heavy so it does take two people to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Angela W

customer_reviews.title: Love this shelf
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf! It was a great solution when we realized we couldn't hang a shelf or coat rack on our walls. It's pretty high quality for the price, went together relatively easily (I put it together myself and it probably took 1.5 hours?), and so far is serving its function well.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L.

customer_reviews.title: Great at first assembly
customer_reviews.text: This made a perfect addition to my home. It is easy to put together and looks quite sharp. I hope the laminate wood pieces are built to last but otherwise seems great
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly kern

customer_reviews.title: Cute and on trend!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! Good quality and sturdy. I was a bit nercousit would be flimsy and feel like it might tip over, but definitely not the case. Even though wood is not real,it still looks nice. Easy to assemble and all pieces were there...lots if times you'll have missing pieces so I was happy to have them all in the box!
customer_reviews.author: jjhicks2000

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed.
customer_reviews.text: You need a standard screwdriver which I didn't have for some reason and had to go out and buy another but other than that, I was able to put this together by myself. It looks great and is now adding some desperately needed storage to my kitchen. I would recommend this to anyone, looks high quality and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi F.

customer_reviews.title: Quality item. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy hall tree. It arrived as promised, well packaged and boxed with no damage to item, even though the box had damage in shipping. All parts were included with clear instructions, and simple to assemble. No problems at all, and very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Not as stable as you might expect, but great product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: It's lighter than expected and a little unsteady, but that can be resolved with a furniture pad under one of the legs and/or strapping it to the wall. Paid a handyman to put it together, so can't speak to ease, but he was done in less than an hour. Looks great and will do the job for our mudroom!
customer_reviews.author: Chi_girl

customer_reviews.title: Decent Storage Tree for Entry Way
customer_reviews.text: Decent! I love the look but a few parts were damaged and holes were not drilled in correct spot. We made do as we did not want to have to ship this heavy box back to Amazon. Looks good in our walk way. It's fun to decorate for various holidays as well. Nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Looks so nice
customer_reviews.text: My husband had it put together within 45 minutes. It looks really nice in our entryway, it is a nice item to hide clutter. (kids shoes, coats and backpacks). Very nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Starkloff

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This made a nice addition to our hallway and was immediately put to good use. It holds a lot, keeps everything organized, and looks good. What more could I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Denise54

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in my entryway. Exactly what I wanted with the top shelf to put decorative items. The bottom rack for shoes is very spacious & can fit both mine & my husbands boots without having to bend them. Have received lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hallway bench
customer_reviews.text: Just received this hallway bench. It came packaged perfectly and the directions were easy to follow. It seems very sturdy and does exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: MIKEYP

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Great value and sturdy enough for all our stuff. Looks just as good as picture, if not better! Kids sit on it, many coats and bags hang on it. Directions to assemble could be better but overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as described. Easy enough to put together. (Although I just watched while the husband worked). For the price point it's great. I added some bins from hobby lobby at the bottom and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: love2shop

customer_reviews.title: Good Hall Tree
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking piece. The faux wood grain is well done, but there is no mistaking that it is not real wood when you look at the unit (upon real inspection). It was relatively easy to put together, but some illustrations could be more helpful in determining which is the front or back side of a piece...which could cause disassembly and reassembly to get it right. Overall for the price, it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Super cute finish
customer_reviews.text: Not as study as i would love,But you can always mount it to the wall as ab option. It's super cute and has a nice finish. I placed mine against a corner wall in my kitchen. it holds well and looks great there-El
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but you get what you pay for price wise
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for on this. Holes didn't meet up and one of the screws, when placed, cracked the top wooden seat. Creaks terribly anytime someone sits on it even well below the weight limit. Overall, it still looks nice, holds a lot of items, top shelf holds more clothing and bike helmets just fine. Don't expect an insanely nice feeling piece of furniture but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Srivoraphan

customer_reviews.title: The black iron brings a warm house industrial look to the house that I love. Couldn’t be any happier about this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it!!! Fits in my very narrow foyer area perfectly with still room to walk around. The wood looks real! The black iron brings a warm house industrial look to the house that I love. Couldn’t be any happier about this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute entry way piece! I put this together myself (didn't want to wait for help and didn't really need it) in about 45 minutes. Love the way it looks and my bf is glad to finally have somewhere to sit while putting on and taking off his shoes. Side note: I did have my bf tighten the screws just to make sure everything would stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! This is very convenient to have especially when you struggle with space! It looks great in my front room, very sturdy, and the price was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: A'Ishah A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together with one person.
customer_reviews.text: Was fairly easy to put together. Took me about an hour with basic tools that they provided. Looks great once all put together and holds three baskets below and several on top. My only complaint is that the hooks could be placed higher to accommodate a long winter coat, especially since there is room for it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice & functional
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my front entry area. Very impressed with the sturdiness, overall look and extreme function. A+ value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for storing camping gear!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf / hall tree is the best thing for storing and displaying all my camping gear. I have two backpacking packs, two day packs, and two emergency preparedness packs, which all fit on the hooks nicely. Then I got the baskets along with some small dividers that fit perfectly for the shelves on the bottom for my smaller camping stuff. It was easy to set up by myself, the wood parts are beautiful, seriously the perfect find!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. Only wish is the wood quality was a little better. I would anchor it to the wall so it does not fall on top of little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette

customer_reviews.title: Great buy/easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great entryway shelf and coat rack. My 4 boys are big mess makers. This entryway coat rack is a life saver for them. I install the coat rack 8 months pregnant. I hadn’t 17 year old help stand up the rack but other than that great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylady

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: We don't have a mud room in our new home so I ordered this for the entrance of our home and we love it. Very sturdy and pretty. Exactly as show online
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose as a hall tree.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and fits well in the space by the front door to hang coats and backpacks. Shoes fit well on bottom shelf and underneath. The only disappointment was the seat is pressed wood with a veneer or something that resembles contact paper. Would be a more attractive piece if the seat were wood.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Arnold

customer_reviews.title: A Great Hall Tree
customer_reviews.text: From what I understand, some of the holes didn't line up good and my husband had to get all the screws going a little before screwing any in all the way, but other than that, it went really easy to put together. It's sturdy and I don't have to worry about it falling over.
customer_reviews.author: nancy norton

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price point. I had to screw to wall to make it extra sturdy but pretty sturdy on its own. Put together in an hour 1/2 with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Roo

customer_reviews.title: You NEED this!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this! I was a little nervous just because it would be a pain to have to send back but to my surprise it was perfect! Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't feeling completely positive about my purchase but once I put together (easy) and realized how sturdy the product was I re
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what I was looking for. Wasn't feeling completely positive about my purchase but once I put together (easy) and realized how sturdy the product was I realized it was a great purchase especially for the price. My 2 boys have somewhere to store all their hats and shoes as they come in the house ;-)
customer_reviews.author: GROCKS

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Wasn't wanting anything fancy since it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Wasn't wanting anything fancy since it was for the garage but to my surprise it really is a nice piece of furniture! Easy to put together too!
customer_reviews.author: mmwmom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I have been looking for!! I didn't want to spend a ton of money for a place just to hang bookbags and put shoes. This was perfect. I was worried about the quality given the price was so cheap but it is great quality! My kids even said it was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kiley Wolken

customer_reviews.title: Ready for Winter
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy construction, easy to assemble, and looks like it will withstand heavy, winter use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: grandkid tested.
customer_reviews.text: this is a well made sturdy coat rack.shelf..boot rack....it has stood the grandkids test...so.we l9ve it.and it looks very nice.Rasy to assemble also
customer_reviews.author: Brian aka Big Dog wardogs making it home alum.live shark

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and so useful!
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the most useful pieces in our house. Fits in the corner perfectly and reduces alot of the clutter we had with coats, shoes, and other stuff
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Affoedable, and So Cute
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this product. It arrived earlier than expected (today), I was able to put it together in a little over an hour, and it has already been the recipient of several praises from my coworkers (I bought it for my office but will eventually bring it home once I move). I almost bought a similar, cheaper model, but after reading reviews, am really glad I went with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna R

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: How can you not love it! I have two daughters that always had their shoes laying around, no more, each person has a wicker basket their shoes go in! It looks good and I love the shelf on top for seasonal and holiday decorating
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect in our mud room
customer_reviews.text: fits perfect in our mud room, looks better in person, holds up well we can put 2 coats on each hook plenty of room for shoes, hats, gloves and everything else that gets left of the top shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Liked how it fit any decor and looked great in my hall
customer_reviews.author: Judi Powell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hall tree!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful item. Looks expensive and is extremely sturdy. I love all the storage it has with a shelf on the top and bottom. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Great... Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! A great catch all Hall tree for my entryway!! Way more space on bottom for shoes than I thought:)
customer_reviews.author: shopper9

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to look good but for such a good price I didn’t think it would be very sturdy. This is a very well-made piece and the bench is definitely sturdy. This definitely surpassed my expectations and my entry area looks WAY better!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted! It was much heavier and sturdier than I expected. It was very easy to assemble, even by myself. The instructions were clear and the whole thing only took me about an hour. It makes my entryway look much more organized, and it's great to have a place to hang our coats and diaper bag. Definitely a great value!
customer_reviews.author: L. GIBB

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for our little mud room. Went together very easy and is rock solid. Now I have a place to sit and put on and take off my boots. Glad I went with this one. My wife has a place to drop off her work bag and I have a place to put my backpack too.
customer_reviews.author: Randy H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Get you one!
customer_reviews.text: I put this together in about 30 minutes, everything fit together easily, no alignment issues. Quality is great, very sturdy. It fit perfectly in my space. Worth it to me!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Really well made and sturdy. It took my husband about an hour to put it together. He was impressed with how well laid out the instructions were and how well the holes lined up. Looks great in our mud room.
customer_reviews.author: MrsM

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy and a great piece of furniture for the money, defiantly happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Super deal!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great & it works very well. Easy to put together. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sissa

customer_reviews.title: I love this addition to my foyer
customer_reviews.text: I love this addition to my foyer. it’s the perfect size and hangs everything I throw at it. the color of the wood is beautiful. you can dress it up with hanging paintings above it, nick knacks on the shelf, or baskets on the bott or just keep it simple.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and I love the semi-industrial look.
customer_reviews.text: This "landing strip" is perfect for my entry. We can dump everything and it doesn't look like a big mess. It's very sturdy too and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moshuk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my entry way area
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my entry way area, especially in winter to have somewhere by the front door for coats and shoes. Easy assembly and seems solid. Anticipating years of use!
customer_reviews.author: kizambo

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you ground it or so when younger children use it to hang their coats on it won't fall
customer_reviews.text: It was used for my younger grandchildren they could climb on and hang up their jackets and put their shoes underneath just high enough for them and not to fall I liked it very much overall it's a good product I would get another one
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Kearney-King

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I had pretty low expectations for this piece but I absolutely love it and think it's a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SFMama

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Not too hard to put together. Sturdy and looks great. Perfect fit for front foyer. Would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, it was exactly what I wanted and needed by my front door on these snowy messy winter days!! It came in perfect condition an hubby put it together in a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Gale

customer_reviews.title: This is a good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Took some time to put together, but every screw lined up and seems solid. This is a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. Fast shipping, easy assembly, and great quality. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erika P

customer_reviews.title: missing screws
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice hall tree for the price but, when assembling, it was inconvenient to not have all the screws necessary for completing the project.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Krowlek

customer_reviews.title: better than described!
customer_reviews.text: so easy to put together and it looks amazing in our entryway. high quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: megzrenee

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was extremely easy to assemble. I did the assembly by myself with no trouble. I purchased this for my kids to hang all their school stuff on...backpacks, coats, etc. The overall structure is sturdy and unit was heavier than I expected. I am very pleased with the price and the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Powell

customer_reviews.title: Easily Assembled
customer_reviews.text: My husband easily assembled this hall tree. It looks just as good in person as the product photos promised. This is a very nice solid piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Janet D.

customer_reviews.title: This hall tree is perfect! If you are looking for something simple for ...
customer_reviews.text: This hall tree is perfect! If you are looking for something simple for your entry, this is it. It's not a large piece, but it does it's job. We got it for our son to be able to sit and put his shoes on. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This hall tree was a gorgeous addition to our home. It was easily put together and is very sturdy (even with 4 rough kids). It can be anchored to the wall and I highly suggested that you do.
customer_reviews.author: Mudery

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Tall, nice size. When put together it wobbled pretty bad, but nothing a couple of thick felt pads couldn’t help. Other than that, it’s very functional and as described. I don’t regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: simple and functional, seems well built and exactly as described, easy to put together, boxed up well, would recommend and would buy again !
customer_reviews.author: CandiCane19

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to put together if you are done by it on your own!!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. 2-person job putting together
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. 2-person job putting together, but we did it rather quickly. Nice and sturdy....love the rustic, yet modern, look of this.
customer_reviews.author: KatC

customer_reviews.title: Looks real good. Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Looks real good. Solid product. I can stand on the bench so it's made well. Took me 30 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C

customer_reviews.title: nice enough
customer_reviews.text: This is a great entryway hall tree. The only drawback is that the shelf on top may shake if too much weight is put on the hooks, so things have to be placed gently. We didn't screw this into the wall (we're renting so we don't want to deal w the holes), but for it being free standing it's sturdy enough. I put cute picture frames on the top shelf. The very bottom bench has enough room for about 5-6 pairs of shoes which is a good amount imo.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Final product looks as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the finished product looked exactly as advertised. The assembly was fairly easy to put together. We put the bench in our vacation rental entry way. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it its very sturdy and hold a ton of stuff
customer_reviews.author: genine pampanini

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and holds up to 6 back packs. And my purse work bag on the bench portion. And all the rainboots fit perfect in the bottom rack.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Ramos

product_meta.title: Homestar with 3-Shelf Hall Tree, 39" x 15.75" x 70.86", Antique Wood
product_meta.description: The rugged good looks of this hall tree were inspired by vintage pieces from yesteryear. Upper and lower shelves offer convenient storage and display space for belongings and baskets. The warm wood tone and black metal frame merge weathered character with a modern edge. Substantial seat makes urban industrial style look wonderfully welcoming.
feature_bullets: TALL HALL TREE: The ultimate organizer, this hall tree with storage bench is a welcome fit for all spaces, including the entryway, foyer, living room, hallway or mud room
URBAN INDUSTRIAL STYLE: The warm wood tone and black metal frame merge weathered character with a modern edge. Substantial seat makes urban industrial style look wonderfully welcoming
VINTAGE INSPIRATION: The rugged good looks of this hall tree were inspired by vintage pieces from yesteryear. Upper and lower shelves offer convenient storage and display space for belongings
GENEROUS SIZE: Hall tree with storage bench measures 39” W x 16” D x 71” H; 2 shelves and 5 hooks provide ample space to keep everything organized
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions and hardware included
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget
